Organization Name: MANNA STOREHOUSE | MAIN OFFICE | MON - FRI BASIC NEEDS
Description: Provides free clothing, food, furniture and household items; utility and prescription assistance.Note: The agency does not assist with deposit and reconnection or late fees.

Organization Name: LIVING WORD TEACHING CENTER | RHOME CENTER | 2ND TUES BASIC NEEDS
Description: Provides food, clothing (including shoes), baby food and baby items, household goods (including furniture and appliances - based on availability/donations).

Organization Name: MISSION ARLINGTON/MISSION METROPLEX | ARLINGTON SITE | HOUSEHOLD GOODS ASSISTANCE
Description: Provides assistance with services that include furniture, school supplies, personal hygiene items, child passenger safety seats, and counseling. Will pick up furniture in good condition from Arlington residents. Also, distributes available fans to eligible households. By making this referral, we know you fit the basic eligibility for this service. However, the referral to this agency is not a guarantee of assistance.
